Package com.authlete.jaxrs.api

Class AuthleteApiImplV3

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.authlete.jaxrs.api.AuthleteApiJaxrsImpl
      • com.authlete.jaxrs.api.AuthleteApiImplV3
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.authlete.common.api.AuthleteApi
    public class AuthleteApiImplV3
extends AuthleteApiJaxrsImpl
    The implementation of AuthleteApi using JAX-RS 2.0 client API. Supports Authlete API V3.
    Author:
    Justin Richer
